text: The 2016 Ligue de Football de Saint Pierre et Miquelon was the 31st season of top-division football in Saint Pierre and Miquelon. Three clubs competed in the league: AS Saint Pierraise, A.S. Miquelonnaise and A.S. Ilienne Amateur. The three teams played each other eight times, composing of a 16-match season starting on 28 May 2016 and ending on 10 September 2016. Saint Pierraise won the league title, amassing the best record after 16 matches. == Clubs == {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Team ! Home city ! title: 2016 Ligue de Football de Saint Pierre et Miquelon
